sections.title: Introduction to Goal-Setting Framework
sections.content: Understand the importance and benefits of setting goals.

sections.title: Identifying and Setting SMART Goals
sections.content: Learn how to set Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, and Time-bound (SMART) goals.

sections.title: Creating an Action Plan
sections.content: Develop a step-by-step plan to achieve your goals.

sections.title: Tracking Progress and Overcoming Obstacles
sections.content: Understand how to track progress and overcome obstacles that may hinder goal achievement.

sections.title: Assessment and Reflection
sections.content: Reflect on the goal-setting process and assess progress towards achieving goals.
